title:
A visual approach to symmetric chain decompositions of finite Young
  lattices
authors:
Terrance Coggins, Robert W. Donley Jr., Ammara Gondal, and Arnav
  Krishna
abstract:
The finite Young lattice $L(m, n)$ is rank-symmetric, rank-unimodal, and has
the strong Sperner property. R. Stanley further conjectured that $L(m, n)$
admits a symmetric chain order. We show that the order structure on $L(m, n)$
is equivalent to a natural ordering on the lattice points of a dilated
$n$-simplex, which in turn corresponds to a weight diagram for the root system
of type $A_n$. Lindstr{\" o}m's symmetric chain decompositions for $L(3, n)$
are described completely through pictures.
